title: Lands' End School Uniform Men's Short Sleeve Tailored Fit Interlock Polo Shirt
features: Light comfortable and breathable: Made from cushiony soft 100% cotton interlock this Lands' End mens polo shirt looks as good as it feels and gives every outfit a smart twist. Machine wash.

Looks good for longer: This is a new generation of mens polo shirt - the enhanced fabric keeps colors true and resists stains. You can wear it again and again and it will still look great so stock up!

Doesn't wear out easily: You'll love the lifespan of this durable mens polo shirt. The breathable cotton fabric resists shrinkage fading and pilling so it looks like new for longer. Try it with jeans!

Feel-good fit: This classic mens polo looks sharp and is incredibly comfortable. It has a slim cut but it's never tight or restrictive. Wear it to the office with a blazer or with jeans on the weekend.
Versatile: Comfy and packable this polo shirt is easy to dress up or down. Try it with jeans and sneakers or pair it with slacks a cardigan and leather shoes for a stylish look that's work-friendly.
description: Every man's wardrobe requires a few timeless classics. After all a quality pair of jeans a cozy cardigan and leather boots can be worn so many ways. But you'll need a comfortable polo like this one to pull everything together and create a look that works for almost every setting. Made from lightweight breathable cotton this Lands' End shirt will last and last. The breezy fabric stays bright for longer and stains are easier to wash away so normal wear and tear is nothing to worry about. It also resists shrinking fading and pilling so you can toss it in the washing machine without a second thought. The smooth covered neck seam reinforced shoulders and neat double-needle stitching make it a real stand out. For work pair it with slacks and your favorite wool blazer. When it's time to unwind it looks great with jeans sneakers and a hoodie. And it's even nice with shorts and sandals on a warm summer day. It's so versatile that you can't go wrong.
